headline: American Water and Essential Utilities Shareholders Approve Merger-Related Proposals at Special Shareholder Meetings
summary: American Water Works Company, Inc. (NYSE: AWK) ("American Water") and Essential Utilities, Inc. (NYSE: WTRG) ("Essential Utilities") announced that, at their respective special shareholder meetings held earlier today, each company's shareholders overwhelmingly approved the proposals related to their previously announced proposed merger, based on final voting results reported by each company on a Current Report on Form 8‑K filed with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission.

headline: Illinois American Water Announces Launch of 2026 American Water Charitable Foundation Water and Environment Grant Program
summary: Illinois American Water is thrilled to announce the launch of the American Water Charitable Foundation 2026 Water and Environment Grant Program. The Foundation invites community partners to apply for grants that promote clean water, conservation, environmental education, climate variability and water-based recreation projects.
